column5: My place is just a few miles west of downtown with easy access to Loop 1, the Ann and Roy Butler hike and bike trail, public transit and numerous Austin gems like Mt. Bonnell, Deep Eddy and Barton Springs  No Television  My place is welcome to solo adventurers, couples and business travelers of all backgrounds.  Coffee and tea, as well as pantry items like oil and seasonings, are available for your use.  I rent another room in the place out, so you may be sharing the common space at times.
column8: Bed + shared bath near Lady Bird Lake
